summary:
Geological engineer with 21 years experience in Geology Operations in South America and West Africa, Venezuela, Nigeria, Angola, Bolivia and Qatar.
Spanish, English and Portuguese at professional level. Intermediate level of French, Italian, basic wording of Dutch.
Competent in Analytical Problem Solving, Strong Communication, Customer/Partner Relationships, and Technology Expertise.
Strong business sense, commitment to deliver step changes in terms of project efficiency and profitability.
Experience with contract management and confident communicating with contractors and customers about project objectives, plans, costs and safety.
•Experience in: Oil and gas Well data acquisition and QC. Supervision of  services companies and elaborate correlations and Composite logs, prognosis and EOWR's. Experience in vertical and horizontals wells and reservoir data science management. Hard worker, responsible, able to work with multicultural environments. Co founder and part time Operations manager of Panaria Alcalá 198 and SuperCars El Pinar(Spain) and DYG Construction and Restoring properties in Portugal. 
Skills: Wellsite and Operation Geology, Subsurface, exploration/development, geosteering, pore pressure, risk Assessment/Management, mud-logging, logging analysis, deep offshore, core logging and facies analysis, siliciclastic and carbonate oil production, value investing, data science.
